table.name: vte_sla_log
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vte_sla_log` ( `vte_sla_logid` int(19) NOT NULL, `slaid` int(19), `related_to` varchar(255), `status` varchar(100), `policy_name` varchar(255), `sla_action_name` varchar(255), `sla_action_trigger` varchar(255), `sla_action_type` varchar(255), `sla_time_elapsed` varchar(255), `sla_time_remaining` varchar(255), PRIMARY KEY(`vte_sla_logid`), INDEX(`vte_sla_logid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

table.name: vte_sla_logcf
vtiger_vteslalog_user_field
vte_sla_log
table.sql: ALTER TABLE `vte_sla_log` ADD INDEX `related_to_index` (`related_to`) USING BTREE ;

table.name: vte_sla_log
table.sql: ALTER TABLE `vte_sla_log` CHANGE `related_to` `related_to` VARCHAR CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci NULL DEFAULT NULL, CHANGE `policy_name` `policy_name` VARCHAR CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci NULL DEFAULT NULL, CHANGE `sla_action_name` `sla_action_name` VARCHAR CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci NULL DEFAULT NULL, CHANGE `sla_action_trigger` `sla_action_trigger` VARCHAR CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci NULL DEFAULT NULL, CHANGE `sla_action_type` `sla_action_type` VARCHAR CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci NULL DEFAULT NULL;

table.name: vte_sla_log

table.name: vte_modules
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vte_modules` ( `module` varchar(50) NOT NULL , `valid` int(1) NULL , PRIMARY KEY (`module`));
